name: TheHostileZone
0:
”Alexa, open the hostile zone”
”Alexa, ask the hostile zone for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start the hostile zone”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the hostile zone
des: Listen to the latest The Hostile Zone podcasts from BBS Radio TV. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
